BBEX3.M.TOP.USD.CM.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Tonga / TOP 1 = USD ... (middle)

Source: Since January 2015 National Reserve Bank of Tonga, Nuku'alofa August 2006 - December 2014, calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the Westpac Bank of Tonga, Nuku'alofa.
